name: MechBall
description:
Entry for Second Mech Jam

Control the mech to destroy enemy ships.

Use WASD for movement.

Space bar for jump (also double jump)

Shift for "attack".

Ah I almost forgot, you have no weapons! Kick the ball to take them down!

Credits:

Joel (8bit-sized) - programming

fireskelet - graphics

Gabriel Ruiz- Music/SFX

Every asset was made for this game jam.

Further details may be added later because at submission time all are sleeping!
